trans-unit.source: Enumerates the resources in a binary resources (.resources) file by reading sequential resource name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: 列舉二進位資源 (.resources) 檔案中的資源，藉由讀取循序資源名稱/值組。

trans-unit.source: **Security Note**: Calling methods in this class with untrusted data is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: **安全性注意事項**︰ 方法呼叫中不受信任的資料與這個類別會造成安全性風險。

trans-unit.source: Call the methods in the class only with trusted data.
trans-unit.target: 僅使用信任的資料類別中呼叫方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](https://docs.com/rick-anderson-1/8710/untrusted-data-security-risks).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[不受信任的資料安全性風險](https://docs.com/rick-anderson-1/8710/untrusted-data-security-risks)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref> class for the specified stream.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref>類別指定的資料流。

trans-unit.source: The ResourceReader constructor instantiates a <xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader> object that retrieves resources either from a standalone .resources file or from a .resources file that is embedded in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: ResourceReader 建構函式具現化<xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>物件，擷取的資源，也就是，或是從獨立的.resources 檔或.resources 檔內嵌於組件。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>

trans-unit.source: To read from a standalone .resources file, instantiate a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object and pass it to the ResourceReader constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要從獨立的.resources 檔案讀取，具現化<xref:System.IO.Stream>物件，並將它傳遞至 ResourceReader 建構函式。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: To read from an embedded .resources file, call the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetManifestResourceStream%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method with the case-sensitive name of the .resources file, and pass the returned <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to the ResourceReader constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要讀取內嵌的.resources 檔中，呼叫<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetManifestResourceStream%2A?displayProperty=fullName>區分大小寫名稱的.resources 檔，並傳回的傳遞方法<xref:System.IO.Stream>ResourceReader 建構函式的物件。</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetManifestResourceStream%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Using an instance of this object with untrusted data is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個物件的執行個體中使用不受信任的資料會有安全性風險。

trans-unit.source: Use this object only with trusted data.
trans-unit.target: 此物件只適用於受信任的資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[不受信任的資料安全性風險](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378)。

trans-unit.source: The input stream for reading resources.
trans-unit.target: 輸入資料流讀取資源。

trans-unit.source: The stream parameter is not readable.
trans-unit.target: stream 參數不是可讀取。

trans-unit.source: The stream parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The stream parameter is .

trans-unit.source: An I/O error has occurred while accessing stream.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤發生時存取 stream 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref> class for the specified named resource file.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref>具名資源檔所指定的類別。

trans-unit.source: The ResourceReader constructor instantiates a <xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader> object that retrieves resources from a standalone .resources file.
trans-unit.target: ResourceReader 建構函式具現化<xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>物件，從獨立的.resources 檔擷取資源。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve resources from an embedded .resources file, use the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader.%23ctor%28System.IO.Stream%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要從內嵌的.resources 檔擷取資源，請使用<xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader.%23ctor%28System.IO.Stream%29>建構函式。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader.%23ctor%28System.IO.Stream%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Using an instance of this object with untrusted data is a security risk.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個物件的執行個體中使用不受信任的資料會有安全性風險。

trans-unit.source: Use this object only with trusted data.
trans-unit.target: 此物件只適用於受信任的資料。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Untrusted Data Security Risks](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[不受信任的資料安全性風險](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=330378)。

trans-unit.source: The path and name of the resource file to read.
trans-unit.target: 路徑和要讀取的資源檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: `filename` is not case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: `filename`不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The fileName parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The fileName parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The file cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The resource file has an invalid format.
trans-unit.target: 資源檔有無效的格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, the length of the file may be zero.
trans-unit.target: 例如，檔案的長度可以為零。

trans-unit.source: Releases all operating system resources associated with this <xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 與此相關聯的作業系統資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Close can be safely called multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 關閉可以安全地呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: When you are finished using this instance of <xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>, call Dispose to release all resources used by this instance.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用此執行個體<xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>，呼叫 Dispose 以釋放此執行個體所使用的所有資源。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>

trans-unit.source: You should eliminate further references to this <xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader> instance so that the garbage collector can reclaim the memory of the instance instead of keeping it alive for finalization.
trans-unit.target: 您應該刪除進一步參考<xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>執行個體，讓記憶體回收行程可以回收執行個體，而不是讓它維持在運作進行最終處理的記憶體。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>

trans-unit.source: Dispose calls the private Dispose(Boolean) method, which contains the code to release managed and unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 處置呼叫的私用的 dispose （boolean） 方法，其中包含表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for this <xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個列舉值<xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you enumerate resources by calling the GetEnumerator method and then repeatedly calling the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method on the returned <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator> object until the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，透過呼叫 GetEnumerator 方法，並重複呼叫來列舉資源<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>方法在傳回<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>物件，直到該方法會傳回`false`。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resource name is available from the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property; its value from the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 資源名稱是可從<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，其值從<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Key%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The example illustrates how to enumerate resources in this way.
trans-unit.target: 此範例說明如何列舉資源以這種方式。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property by the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader> class can throw the following exceptions: - <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException> The assembly that contains the type to which the data belongs cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>類別可能會擲回下列例外狀況:-<xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>找不到組件，其中包含資料所屬的類型。</xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException> </xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator.Value%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.FormatException> The data is not in the expected format.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.FormatException>資料不是預期的格式。</xref:System.FormatException>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.TypeLoadException> The type to which the data belongs cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.TypeLoadException>找不到資料所屬的類型。</xref:System.TypeLoadException>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the exception by calling the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader.GetResourceData%2A> method to retrieve information about the data type and the byte array assigned to the named resource.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由呼叫處理例外狀況<xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader.GetResourceData%2A>方法來擷取的資料類型與位元組陣列指派給具名資源的相關資訊。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader.GetResourceData%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Retrieving Resources by Name with GetResourceData" section in the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader> class topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 擷取資源的名稱與 GetResourceData 」 一節<xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>類別主題。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader> class includes two methods that return enumerators.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] ><xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>類別包含兩個方法會傳回列舉值。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>

trans-unit.source: The GetEnumerator method returns an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator> interface object and is the recommended method to call when enumerating resources.
trans-unit.target: GetEnumerator 方法會傳回<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>介面物件，並呼叫時的建議的方法列舉資源。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for this <xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉值<xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The reader has been closed or disposed, and cannot be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 讀取器已關閉或處置，無法存取。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the type name and data of a named resource from an open resource file or stream.
trans-unit.target: 從開啟資源檔或資料流擷取的型別名稱和資料的具名資源。

trans-unit.source: The name of a resource.
trans-unit.target: 資源的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a string that represents the type name of the retrieved resource (see the Remarks section for details).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含代表所擷取資源的型別名稱的字串 （請參閱 < 備註 > 一節以取得詳細資料）。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數未初始化便傳遞。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a byte array that is the binary representation of the retrieved type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法傳回時，包含所擷取類型的二進位表示法的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數未初始化便傳遞。

trans-unit.source: resourceName is .
trans-unit.target: resourceNameis .

trans-unit.source: resourceName does not exist.
trans-unit.target: resourceName不存在。

trans-unit.source: resourceName has an invalid type.
trans-unit.target: resourceName有無效的類型。

trans-unit.source: The retrieved resource data is corrupt.
trans-unit.target: 擷取的資源資料已損毀。

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref> object is not initialized, probably because it is closed.
trans-unit.target: 目前<xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref>物件未初始化，可能是因為它已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator for this <xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個列舉值<xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: IEnumerable.GetEnumerator is an explicit interface implementation.
trans-unit.target: IEnumerable.GetEnumerator 是明確介面實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>

trans-unit.source: The recommended approach to enumerating the resources in a .resources file is to call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> method of the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator> object returned by the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 列舉資源的.resources 檔案中的建議的方法是呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>方法<xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator>所傳回物件<xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for this <xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉值<xref href="System.Resources.ResourceReader"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The reader has already been closed and cannot be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 讀取器已經關閉，且無法存取。
